mapper.select: SELECT permission.uuid as permissionUuid, permission.permission_code as permissionCode, permission.permission_style as permissionStyle, permission.permission_name as permissionName, permission.permission_order AS permissionOrder, permission.permission_url as permissionUrl, permission.permission_par_code as permissionParCode, permission.permission_desc as permissionDesc FROM system_user user LEFT JOIN system_user_role user_role ON user_role.user_uuid = user.uuid LEFT JOIN system_role_permission role_permission ON role_permission.role_uuid = user_role.role_uuid LEFT JOIN system_permission permission ON role_permission.permission_uuid = permission.uuid WHERE user.uuid = #{userUuid} AND permission_state = 1 ORDER BY permission_order ASC

SELECT permission.uuid as permissionUuid, permission.permission_code as permissionCode, permission.permission_style as permissionStyle, permission.permission_name as permissionName, permission.permission_order AS permissionOrder, permission.permission_url as permissionUrl, permission.permission_par_code as permissionParCode, permission.permission_desc as permissionDesc FROM system_permission permission ORDER BY permission_order ASC
SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(1),0) FROM system_permission son LEFT JOIN system_permission par ON par.permission_code = son.permission_par_code WHERE par.uuid = #{uuid}
